Package imagingbook.pub.geometry.basic

Interface Pnt2d

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Corner, Pnt, Pnt2d.PntDouble, Pnt2d.PntInt, SiftDescriptor, Vector2D
    public interface Pnt2d
    Interface specifying the behavior of simple 2D points. It is used to adapt to different (legacy) point implementations with a common API. To some extent this is similar to the functionality provided by Point2D and Point but was re-implemented to avoid dependency on AWT and for more flexibility in naming and class structure.
    Two concrete classes are defined for points with double and int coordinates, respectively. See Pnt2d.PntDouble and Pnt2d.PntInt for how to instantiate such point objects.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface Description
      static class  Pnt2d.PntDouble
      Immutable 2D point with double coordinates.
      static class  Pnt2d.PntInt
      Immutable 2D point with int coordinates.
